name: Maniac Love
description:
You're just an ordinary woman who got kidnapped by a crazy man who brought you to this huge abandoned mansion. He locked you on one of the rooms and you need to find a way to escape and leave this place, while your kidnapper wanders around the house looking for you.

This game is a submission for the "Horrors for my Valentine" Jam hosted by Gamedevboi.

  • Sometimes in the browser version the game has a sound glitch on switching between game, menu and cutscenes. Try the Windows version for better performance.
Assets
  • Fonts: Angry Chalk | Notepad
  • Models: PSX Car | Female Model | Male Model | Knife
  • Sounds: Freesound
  • Textures: AmbientCG | Textures | Pixabay | Pexels | Unsplash

   Everything else I did myself :)

Support me!

Consider making a donation, this helps me to make bigger and better games and asset packs! :D
